gen:link.msg:message: BR-OCW-JRK.S.1: The number of contexts referring to the start balance en end balance of the current reporting year in this report are {count($ThisYearStartBalances)} and {count($ThisYearEndBalances)} respectively. At least two context periods of an OCW annual report must contain element 'xbrli:instant' as a child of 'xbrli:period' and the date values must be the end dates of the current reporting year and the previous reporting year.

BR-OCW-JRK.S.2: No context in this report refers to the duration of the current reporting year. At least one context MUST contain elements 'xbrli:startDate' and 'xbrli:endDate' as a child of 'xbrli:period' and the date values MUST be the start date of the reporting year and the end date of the reporting year respectively.

BR-OCW-JRK.S.3: The following invalid date values for balance contexts have been found in this report: {string-join((for $d in $InvalidInstantPeriodDatesInInstance return string($d)), ', ')}. Valid date values for balance contexts are {$ValidDates}.

BR-OCW-JRK.S.3: The following invalid startDate/endDate values for duration contexts have been found in this report: {string-join((for $d in $InvalidDurationPeriodsInInstance return concat($d/xbrli:startDate,'/',$d/xbrli:endDate)), ', ')}. Valid combinations of date values for duration contexts are {$ValidDates}.

BR-OCW-JRK.S.4: The following adimensional contexts in this report refer to an invalid duration period: {string-join((for $d in $InvalidAdimensionalFSTContexts return $d/@id), ', ')}. Contexts which do not refer to any dimensional values or only to 'Financial statements type', MUST refer to the duration of the current reporting year.

BR-OCW-JRK.S.5: The following actuals contexts in this report refer to an invalid period: {string-join((for $d in $InvalidActualsContexts return $d/@id), ', ')}. Contexts with dimensional value 'Actuals' MUST refer to the current reporting year or the previous reporting year.

TBR-OCW-JRK.S.6: he following estimates contexts in this report refer to an invalid period: {string-join((for $d in $InvalidEstimatesContexts return $d/@id), ', ')}. Contexts with dimensional value 'Estimates' MUST refer to the current reporting year.

BR-OCW-JRK.S.7: The following forecast contexts in this report refer to an invalid period: {string-join((for $d in $InvalidForecastContexts return $d/@id), ', ')}. Contexts with dimensional value 'Forecast' MUST refer to coming reporting years.

BR-OCW-JRK.S.8: The following segment reporting contexts in this report refer to an invalid period: {string-join((for $d in $InvalidSegmentReportingContexts return $d/@id), ', ')}. Contexts with dimension 'Segment reporting' MUST refer to the duration or the end balance of the reporting year.

BR-OCW-JRK.S.9: The following contexts in this report contain an invalid dimension for 'Financial statements type': {string-join((for $d in $InvalidSeparateDimensionValueContexts return $d/@id), ', ')}. If item 'rj-i:DocumentRelatesToIndividualEntityOrGroup' (Financial statements type) contains value 'Enkelvoudig' (Separate), then dimension 'Financial statements type' MUST only be reported with value 'Enkelvoudig'.

BR-OCW-JRK.S.10: The following contexts with typed dimensions in this report refer to an invalid period: {string-join((for $d in $InvalidTypedDimensionContexts return $d/@id), ', ')}. Items within a typed dimension which are part of regular individual specifications MUST refer to the current reporting year, which includes the current year start balance.

BR-OCW-JRK.S.11: The following movement items in this report refer to an invalid period: {string-join((for $d in $InvalidMovementItems return concat(xfi:concept-label(QName(namespace-uri($d), local-name($d)),'http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/link','http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/label','en'),' [',name($d),'] in context ',$d/@contextRef)), ', ')}. Movement items of movement schedules MUST refer to the duration of the current reporting year.

BR-OCW-JRK.S.12: The following balance items in this report refer to an invalid period: {string-join((for $d in $InvalidEndBalanceItems return concat(xfi:concept-label(QName(namespace-uri($d), local-name($d)),'http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/link','http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/label','en'),' [',name($d),'] in context ',$d/@contextRef)), ', ')}. Balance items containing maturity or other risk assessments, MUST refer to the end balance of the current reporting year.
